StoryText: My wife wants to go out to dinner but I wanted to watch a hockey game.
Question: What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Go out to dinner and record the game to watch later
Tell her I want to stay home and watch the game and order food to be delivered
Make dinner for the two of you and watch the game during dinner
Go out to dinner early so that I can come back and see the end of the game

OptionResult.Result: The dinner is expensive but my wife and I have a great time, however, someone at the restaurant ruins the game for me and I end up getting in a fight.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Well, the night went well with my wife and I was looking forward to watching the game at home until someone ruined it and I got carried away and got into a fight. That was kind of dumb of me.

OptionResult.Result: My wife gets annoyed with me but I get to watch the entire game. Also, I saved money on cheap delivery.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I definitely saved money by ordering cheap delivery and I had a great time watching the game... but I realized by the end of the game how agitated my wife was. Whoops!

OptionResult.Result: My wife loves the idea and enjoys watching the game with me. However, I burn myself badly when cooking dinner.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My wife actually loved the idea of eating together and watching the game since I put in the effort to make us dinner. Dinner was delicious, but I burned myself really badly on the stove!

OptionResult.Result: My wife is happy with me and we have a great time. The dinner is expensive but I get back in time to see the end of the game.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: All in all, Iâ€™m glad I made this decision. The game only got interesting at the end anyway and I saw the whole last bit, plus my wife and I had a great night.
